title: Executive Order 5351-Phosphate Restoration No. 52
content: So much of the order of February 3, 1913, creating Phosphate Reserve No. 16, Florida No. 5, as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked, and all such lands not otherwise reserved or withdrawn are hereby restored to the public domain and to disposition under the laws applicable thereto.

T. 33 S., R. 27 E., sec. 7, NW. ¼ of NE. ¼, NE. ¼ of SE. ¼;                             sec. 15, SE. ¼ of SE. ¼;                             sec. 20, NW. ¼ of NE.¼, NE. ¼ of NW. ¼;                             sec. 30, W. ½ of NE. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5351-Phosphate Restoration No. 52 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372962
